episodes.synopsis: As the grand ending to a project week about anti-bullying, Hjørdis is putting on a play, but a surprise guest forces her to compromise her vision.
episodes.title: The Guest

episodes.synopsis: As the theater troupe struggles to get the play into shape, Hjørdis devises a plan that demands that the pupils prepare to put themselves on the line.
episodes.title: The Group

episodes.synopsis: Hjørdis wants Kristoffer to portray a princess, but Gert and Kristoffer's big brother object; a three-way drama creates problems within the group.
episodes.title: The Princess

episodes.synopsis: As the theater troupe falls apart, Hjørdis fears their play will fail; when Kristoffer's dad pressures him to leave the group, a daring plan is born.
episodes.title: In the Spotlight

video.title: Hjørdis
video.synopsis: This miniseries spinoff of "Rita" follows teacher Hjørdis as she plans a school play on bullying featuring a cast of socially awkward students.
